item.description:
Hi everyone, sorry for the late posting, been away and still searching for a place to live in a week, lol.

Onto this week's incubator, Nikki's heading off to Spain to study abroad so let's send her off in good fashion with a fun-filled incubator.

As always bring a smile, some friends, and a positive attitude...some extra hugs for Nikki too.

Also this week, one of Barbara's friends will organize some games to play alongside some of our classics and a few new ones too.

We'll keep building off of everything we have been as of late. Also some other exciting news and opportunities for some incubators will be announced shortly.

I hope to see a ton of you on Thursday night.

Cheers!

Jason J.
item.name: From Cambridge to Spain, Nikki's last meetup before she leaves! Come see her off
